mention.text: aylwin that by way of `` protest '' against these actions he would not attend the luncheon to which the president had invited all the commanders of the armed forces branches
the first 70 days of his administration
the growing rightwing opposition to the actions of the democratic administration
the actions of the democratic administration
pinochet every day and longing for his authoritarian regime , the leftwing parties
the presidential speech to congress at the legislative palace in valparaiso
the military regime , general augusto pinochet used to read his state of the nation address on 11
the anniversary of the military coup d'etat through which he seized power
his latest private meeting with the president
the `` truth and reconciliation '' commission that aylwin had created to investigate human rights violations during the military regime
the luncheon to which the president had invited all the commanders of the armed forces branches
his attempt to convoke the national security council and to make this council issue a statement against the `` truth and reconciliation '' commission
his attempt to convoke the national security council
the very same ones that did not support his attempt to convoke the national security council
the commanders of the other armed forces branches
